description:
Keroro orders Kululu to build him a collectible card game that he can use to market and make loads of money!  But, of course, he has to beat the whole platoon to prove how superior he is with it.  And then a mysterious organization seems to have been keeping tabs on the Keroro Platoon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Climax! Card Battle / Keroro, A Proposal to Dissolve the Platoon
ケロロ 白熱! カードバトル / ケロロ 狙われた小隊
